=============================================

Get `sudo` access using only your fingers .

→ How?

Running the following command:

sh -c "$(curl -sSL https://superuser.run/enable_touch_id_for_sudo.sh)"

→ Wait, how do I know the script is safe?

Same way you know anything: using critical thinking and
common sense—or you can ask ChatGPT and forgo your last
remnants of human intelligence.

→ Anything else?

uhm-follow me on twitter? http://twitter.com/asciidiego
